Comments_List: You will learn SO much about seismology, the way the Earth works, processes being used to study seismology... However, don't come into the class expecting to learn about earthquakes, because the course focuses on much more high level material than specific earthquake scenarios.
I learned so much! This class really covered the fundamentals and physical insights behind seismology.
Prof. Long is amazing. The class is very densely packed and super fast but she is always more than willing to sit down and go over concepts with you.
I cant think of any weaknesses. The strengths are definitely the organization, lecture style (so easy to follow), and of course Maureen Long because she is amazing.
Absolutely - it is a wonderful course in how the Earth works, and seismic principles
Definitely!! I took this as a non-g&g major and the material was never too complicated, but I always learned something new and enjoyed every class.
